extracted_playbook.title: Update VPNs and Network Devices
extracted_playbook.description: Update VPNs, network infrastructure devices, and devices used for remote work with the latest software patches and configurations.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Use multi-factor authentication to reduce the impact of password compromises.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Management Interfaces
extracted_playbook.description: Protect the management interfaces of critical operational systems using browse-down architecture to prevent attackers from gaining privileged access.

extracted_playbook.title: Set Up Security Monitoring Capability
extracted_playbook.description: Establish a security monitoring capability to collect data needed for analyzing network intrusions.

extracted_playbook.title: Review and Refresh Incident Management Processes
extracted_playbook.description: Review and refresh incident management processes to ensure effective response to security incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Modern Systems and Software
extracted_playbook.description: Use modern systems and software with built-in security features. If unable to upgrade immediately, take short-term steps to improve security on obsolete platforms.

extracted_playbook.title: Invest in Malware Prevention
extracted_playbook.description: Invest in preventing malware-based attacks across various scenarios.
